it all depends on the relation between

is going to rise above the surrounding

the adhesive forces is stronger than

now in the case of mercury

the cohesive forces are greater than the

and notice that mercury has a downward

the meniscus for water is a concave up
shape
so mercury
is more attracted to itself
than it is to the glass
and so that's why the cohesive forces
